headline: PulteGroup Announces Appointment of Kristin Gannon to its Board of Directors
summary: ATLANTA, February 09, 2026--PulteGroup, Inc. (NYSE: PHM), the nation's third largest homebuilder, today announced the appointment of Kristin Gannon, Managing Director at Eastdil Secured, as a new independent director to its Board, effective February 10, 2026. Ms. Gannon will serve on the Nominating and Governance Committee and the Audit Committee.
